member.name: T:Text
member.summary: The Text object provides helpful operations for working with Text.

member.name: M:Append
member.summary: Appends two text inputs and returns the result as another text. This operation is particularly useful when dealing with unknown text in variables which could accidentally be treated as numbers and get added, instead of getting appended.
member.param: First part of the text to be appended.
Second part of the text to be appended.
member.returns: The appended text containing both the specified parts.

member.name: M:GetLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the given text.
member.param: The text whose length is needed.
member.returns: The length of the given text.

member.name: M:IsSubText
member.summary: Gets whether or not a given subText is a subset of the larger text.
member.param: The larger text within which the sub-text will be searched.
The sub-text to search for.
member.returns: True if the subtext was found within the given text.

member.name: M:EndsWith
member.summary: Gets whether or not a given text ends with the specified subText.
member.param: The larger text to search within.
The sub-text to search for.
member.returns: True if the subtext was found at the end of the given text.

member.name: M:StartsWith
member.summary: Gets whether or not a given text starts with the specified subText.
member.param: The larger text to search within.
The sub-text to search for.
member.returns: True if the subtext was found at the start of the given text.

member.name: M:GetSubText
member.summary: Gets a sub-text from the given text.
member.param: The text to derive the sub-text from.
Specifies where to start from.
Specifies the length of the sub text.

member.name: M:GetSubTextToEnd
member.summary: Gets a sub-text from the given text from a specified position to the end.
member.param: The text to derive the sub-text from.
Specifies where to start from.

member.name: M:GetIndexOf
member.summary: Finds the position where a sub-text appears in the specified text.
member.param: The text to search in.
The text to search for.
member.returns: The position at which the sub-text appears in the specified text. If the text doesn't appear, it returns 0.

member.name: M:ConvertToLowerCase
member.summary: Converts the given text to lower case.
member.param: The text to convert to lower case.
member.returns: The lower case version of the given text.

member.name: M:ConvertToUpperCase
member.summary: Converts the given text to upper case.
member.param: The text to convert to upper case.
member.returns: The upper case version of the given text.

member.name: M:GetCharacter
member.summary: Given the Unicode character code, gets the corresponding character, which can then be used with regular text.
member.param: The character code (Unicode based) for the required character.
member.returns: A Unicode character that corresponds to the code specified.

member.name: M:GetCharacterCode
member.summary: Given a Unicode character, gets the corresponding character code.
member.param: The character whose code is requested.
member.returns: A Unicode based code that corresponds to the character specified.
